    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107276</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical energy in atoms and molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Energie in den Atomen und in den 
Molekülen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie chimique en atomes et molécules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia química nos átomos e nas moléculas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia chimica in atomi e molecole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημική ενέργεια στα άτομα και τα μόρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía química en átomos y moléculas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows atomic and molecular models of hydrogen and oxygen  as water is formed and chemical energy is released.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Atom- und molekularen 
Modelle des Wasserstoffs und des Sauerstoffes, während Wasser 
gebildet wird und chemische Energie freigegeben wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les modèles atomiques 
et moléculaires de l'hydrogène et de l'oxygène pendant que l'eau 
est formée et de l'énergie chimique est libérée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra modelos atômicos e 
molecular do hidrogênio e do oxigênio enquanto a água é dada forma
e a energia química está liberada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i modelli atomici e 
molecolari di idrogeno e di ossigeno mentre l'acqua è formata e 
l'energia chimica è liberata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ατομικά και μοριακά 
μοντέλα του υδρογόνου και του οξυγόνου καθώς το ύδωρ 
διαμορφώνεται και η χημική ενέργεια εκδίδεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra modelos atómicos y 
moleculares del hidrógeno y del oxígeno mientras que se forma el 
agua y la energía química release/versión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
